title: Find Your Perfect Dietitian
description: Answer a few quick questions so we can match you with the right registered dietitian and confirm your insurance benefits.

questions.text: What's the main reason for your visit?
questions.helpText: We'll use this to find your perfect match.

questions.text: Are there any other reasons for your visit?
Which state do you live in?
questions.helpText: We'll use this to match you with a dietitian licensed in your state.

questions.text: What health insurance do you have?
questions.helpText: We work with most major insurance companies.

questions.heading: You're in luck!
questions.text: Most Aetna plans offer 10 sessions per year at $0 out-of-pocket.

questions.helpText: By clicking continue, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and accepted the Berry Street Consent and Berry Street Communication policies.

validation.message: Please enter a valid email address.
